patthana15.1:2.1: Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ kusalañca nahetuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi (cittasamuṭṭhānameva, ārammaṇaṃ natthi.)
patthana15.1:3.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:5.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana15.1:6.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:7.1: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:8.1: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana15.1:9.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana15.1:10.1: Hetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana15.1:11.1: Nahetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana15.1:12.1: Hetuṃ akusalañca nahetuṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:14.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana15.1:15.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:16.1: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:17.1: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana15.1:18.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:19.1: Nahetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Nissayavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
